name: StayAlive
0:
”Alexa, open Stay Alive”
”play chapter three”
”scroll right”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stay alive
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay Alive is a 75-minute video documentary serving at-risk populations. The program deliver messages of Education, Compassion and Caring for those who are in deep despair, along with Guidance for their families and friends who love them. Stay Alive is recommended for individuals, families, schools, communities, social services, and churches – anywhere there is a need.

Play the chapter you want by saying, "Alexa, play chapter <number>", or play the music video by saying, "play the music video".

Disclaimers: Stay Alive is an educational and informational program only offering compassion and communication - not psychotherapy nor medical advice. It is not a substitute for professional, psychiatric or psychological treatment. No Liability: The makers and distributors of this program, and those who appear in it, assume no liability resulting from its use or misuse. Disclosures: Mark Goulston, MD is a retired physician and no longer sees private patients. Neither Kevin Hines nor Rayko are trained as psychological professionals; they offers their personal experiences for educational and informational purposes only. Stay Alive LLC provides this program solely as a public service.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
